topic.title: DNS_PROBE_FINISHED_NXDOMAIN bug
topic.body: Whenever there is a non-ZeroNet url and i click it, it gives me the errror message "DNS_PROBE_FINISHED_NXDOMAIN". What now?

topic.title: copying user.json is not copying identity
topic.body:
I unzipped ZeroBundle on a different PC
I copied the user.json and placed it in the data folder
I opened zeronet with the cmd file
a new identity is created

How am I supposed to copy my identity?

topic.title: Cant copy my identity
topic.body:
I created an identity on computer1
i started ZeroBundle on computer 2
I stop ZeroBundle on computer 2
i overwrote the user.json on computer 2
I restarted ZeroBundle on computer2
Yet, the identity is not carried over.

Anyone else have this issue?

topic.title: Content missing
topic.body:
Non-programmer here.

I cloned the ZeroTalk and grep-ed the text to Japanese for the JP audience. I changed the static texts, published it, posted some stuff and all seems to work well. However, now my content is missing. I had 2 posts but it's gone... any ideas?
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KMSfa7mF911ert6iFQuwfJPMqpT8uZT8s/

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: anyone commenting from a very restricted nation?

> [angristan](#comment_30_1MEWJRMLgvofqG9Mbsb2Rc4hFFyv7HeRx7): France ? ¯_(ツ)_/¯

lol, too open.
was hoping someone from Russia or Turkmenistan or some similar place
cant seem to import user.json into a new machine...

> [antiphase](#comment_30_1NoRNknY1JbJ8nMdn88LwczyMDFnR1GtNw): The file name is users.json, not user.json.

sorry, meant users.json.
Placed the file in the same path of the new machine, but still will not import the data...
FYI Win10

2_14CxrQGKkqTPKda94c9j1z7zBX3q53dPfr.body: wont load.  Console says its giving up

2_1MCsyW6W243LY69ZYm99XbV3M8Gbbrp5hF.body:
I use PIA, simple and cheap,
Also fixes security issues relatively quickly (dns leaks, ssl, etc)
